law.catch_line: No person may treat any animal with any material or substance or in any manner for the purpose of pr...

text.section: No person may treat any animal with any material or substance or in any manner for the purpose of preventing normal reaction of the animal to any test.
A person may not knowingly sell or offer for sale any animal that has reacted to any test, without informing the purchaser of the reaction.
No animal that has reacted to a test may be sold or removed from the premises where the test was made without the written permission of the Secretary.
